Task 4 (7 Marks)

Suggested Time for Task 4: 20 minutes

Download the Lunch Menu and the Task 4 File.

Save both files in your Tasks folder.

a) Open your email software and prepare a new email. (1 mark)

b) Address the email to your manager at jsmith@digi-stuff.co.uk. (1 mark)

c) CC to fbloggs@digi-stuff.co.uk. (1 mark)

d) Add the subject heading Lunch Menu. (1 mark)

e) Attach the Lunch Menu file. (1 mark)

f) Inform your manager that you have found a venue. Ask them to select which lunch menu option they would prefer you to order from the list attached. (1 mark)

(You do not need to send the email).

Take a screenshot of the finished email. Paste this into your Task 4 File.

g) Add your manager's name (John Smith) and email address (jsmith@digi-stuff.co.uk) as a new contact in your address book. (1 mark)

Take a screenshot of the updated address book. Paste this into your Task 4 File.

Save your Task 4 File.

Upload your finished file by using the Upload button below.

When you have finished Task 4 press Next.
